summary: Three tales of terror involve a grieving widower and the daughter he abandoned; a drunkard and his wife's black cat; and a hypnotist who prolongs the moment of a man's death.
cast: Vincent Price|Maggie Pierce|Leona Gage|Peter Lorre|Joyce Jameson|Basil Rathbone|Debra Paget|David Frankham|Lennie Weinrib|Wally Campo|Alan DeWitt|John Hackett|Edmund Cobb|Scott Brown|Benjie Bancroft|Paul Bradley|Kenneth Gibson|Kenner G. Kemp|Jack Kenny|Cosmo Sardo|Jack Tornek
title: Historias de terror
